templates.name: waf02
templates.expression: (((not ip.geoip.country in {"AR" "US" "CA"}) and not ip.src in $whitelist_ip) or (cf.client.bot and (http.request.uri.query contains "p=" or http.request.uri.query contains "dir=" or http.request.uri.query contains "order=" or http.request.uri.query contains "mode=" or http.request.uri.query contains "limit=" or http.request.uri.query contains "cat=" or http.request.uri.query contains "SID=" or http.request.uri.query contains "criterion=" or http.request.uri.query contains "color=" or http.request.uri.query contains "size=" or http.request.uri.query contains "price=" or http.request.uri.query contains "brand=")) or ( http.user_agent contains "Scrapy" or http.user_agent contains "seranking" or http.user_agent contains "Bytespider" or http.user_agent contains "GeedoProductSearch" or http.user_agent contains "opensiteexplorer" or http.user_agent contains "BLEXBot" or http.user_agent contains "Barkrowler" or http.user_agent contains "GPTBot" or http.user_agent contains "Amazonbot" or http.user_agent contains "Yandex" or http.user_agent contains "Semrush" or http.user_agent contains "AhrefsBot" or http.user_agent contains "claude" or http.user_agent contains "CCBot" or http.user_agent contains "ChatGPT-User" or http.user_agent contains "YouBot" or http.user_agent contains "Google-Extended" or http.user_agent contains "Applebot-Extended" or http.user_agent contains "anthropic-ai" or http.user_agent contains "ClaudeBot" or http.user_agent contains "Omgilibot" or http.user_agent contains "Omgili" or http.user_agent contains "FacebookBot" or http.user_agent contains "Diffbot" or http.user_agent contains "ImagesiftBot" or http.user_agent contains "PerplexityBot" or http.user_agent contains "cohere-ai" or http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalAgent" or http.user_agent contains "Meta-ExternalFetcher" or http.user_agent contains "Timpibot" or http.user_agent contains "Webzio-Extended")) and (not starts_with(http.request.uri.path, "/.well-known"))
